long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Rotate, Zoom, and Pan YouTube videos by 90, 180, or 270 degrees on your desktop.

Keyboard Shortcuts:

Shift+Alt+1: Rotate 0 degrees (reset to default)
Shift+Alt+2: Rotate 90 degrees
Shift+Alt+3: Rotate 180 degrees
Shift+Alt+4: Rotate 270 degrees

Shift+Alt+Wheel: Zoom (0.1x to 4x)
Shift+Alt+Mouse Move (no click): Pan

Tested on Chrome and Edge on Windows. For suggestions or feedback, please email us. Thank you!
